title: From masks to bounding boxes
description: Current competition metric implies segmenation task. However one valid approach could incorporate object detection. In this direcrion and borrowing stuff from Kevin's excellent kernel https://www.kaggle.com/kmader/baseline-u-net-model-part-1, we attempt to extract bounding boxes information from binary rle-encoded masks.
